article.title: Reproducible, interactive, scalable and extensible microbiome data science using QIIME 2

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the primary benefit of QIIME 2\'s plugin architecture?
choices: It allows users to choose from a variety of visualizations.
It enables third-party contributions of new functionalities.
It ensures the scalability of data analysis for large datasets.
It simplifies the process of data provenance tracking.

multiple_choice_question.text: What key feature differentiates QIIME 2 from the microbiome analysis tool mothur?
choices: Use of the Python programming language

multiple_choice_question.text: According to Figure 1c, what information can be obtained from the bar charts in a feature volatility plot?
choices: The abundance of specific microbial features at a single time point.
The change in microbial composition across different sample types.
The importance and mean abundance of microbial features over time.
The phylogenetic relationships between different microbial taxa.

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the network diagram in Figure 2 represent?
choices: The flow of data through a typical machine learning model.
The steps involved in generating a phylogenetic tree.
The tracked data provenance of a specific analysis result.
The structure of a microbial community based on sequencing data.
